title: Barcode
text:
Twice a day
I sat and prayed for my brother’s name
Seven hours of holy power
Was never quite loud enough

Thrice a week
I failed to speak
For my soul was weak
That didn’t change the holy stage
But my holy rage increased

Once a month
I met a dove from up above
He told me how to look around
And ground my sound in you

There’s more to this
There’s more to you
Than one hour a day

You are here
You are near
You are very near
